Macro Programmer

30 October 2013

“

Are you on the market for this contract engagement? This is initially a 3-month contract. Only considering W2 hourly rates at this time.

  • PHP Framework
  • Good with .Net programming language
  • Candidate must be an expert with Excel Macros.
  • Familiar with Web Markup Standards / Layout (HTML, XHTML, HTML5, CSS)

Entry from @codevinsky

”
